scripts.build: bun build ./src/http/http.ts --outfile ./dist/http/http.js --external @gooi/app-spec-contracts/compiled --external @gooi/app-runtime-facade-contracts/create --external @gooi/host-contracts/principal --external @gooi/surface-contracts --external @gooi/surface-runtime && bun build ./src/cli/cli.ts --outfile ./dist/cli/cli.js --external @gooi/app-spec-contracts/compiled --external @gooi/app-runtime-facade-contracts/create --external @gooi/host-contracts/principal --external @gooi/surface-contracts --external @gooi/surface-runtime && bun build ./src/web/web.ts --outfile ./dist/web/web.js --external @gooi/app-spec-contracts/compiled --external @gooi/app-runtime-facade-contracts/create --external @gooi/host-contracts/principal --external @gooi/surface-contracts --external @gooi/surface-runtime && bun build ./src/webhook/webhook.ts --outfile ./dist/webhook/webhook.js --external @gooi/app-spec-contracts/compiled --external @gooi/app-runtime-facade-contracts/create --external @gooi/host-contracts/principal --external @gooi/surface-contracts --external @gooi/surface-runtime
